title: Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap, 72"L x 24"W x 2/5 Inch Thick; color: teal
descriptions: Find your flow with the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat—your cushioned, supportive base for yoga, Pilates, and all your favorite floor workouts. At 72 inches long and 24 inches wide, it offers generous space for every stretch and pose, while the 2/5-inch extra-thick NBR foam delivers plush comfort for knees, hips, and spine without sacrificing stability. Lightweight at just 3.11 pounds and finished in a refreshing teal, this mat is easy to take anywhere thanks to the included Easy-Cinch carrier strap—just roll, strap, and go. The soft-cushion feel helps reduce joint pressure during longer sessions, and the durable NBR material stands up to daily practice. Whether you’re flowing through vinyasa, holding core-strengthening Pilates moves, or doing restorative stretches at home, this mat supports every move with comfort and confidence. Elevate your practice with a mat that feels as good as it looks.
